"A.I.S. Vega":
"This explains how to use the A.I.S. Vega.

The A.I.S. Vega is capable of fighting in a zero-gravity environment, and can move freely in three-dimensional space.
Ascend: <%Jump>
Descend: <%PhotonArts> on the back palette

You can move at high speed by holding a direction after a Step.
Step Boost: Move input after a Step

When you use the skill \"Auto Track\", if you move while locked on to an enemy, you will automatically match that enemy's altitude."

"This section explains the A.I.S. Vega's new armaments.

(1) Counter Shield
Blocks and counters enemy attacks.
Press and hold on the Counter Shield icon on the Subpalette to deploy the shield at the cost of PP, and absorb energy by blocking attacks with the shield.
Release it to perform the counterattack.

(2) Multi-Lock Missile
Hold <%NormalAttack> on the back palette to target multiple enemies simultaneously.
Release <%NormalAttack> to fire missiles at all targeted enemies."
